message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $22,000. I believe it holds significant value that justifies this price.
I'm interested in the product, but $22,000 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000
Bob, thanks for your interest. While I understand your perspective, the product's value is considerably higher than your offer.  How about we meet in the middle at $18,000?
I'm still not convinced that the product is worth $18,000 to me. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so I'll offer $13,000
Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  Let's make this work - I'm willing to come down to $16,000. This is a very competitive price for the value you're getting.
I'm getting closer to being convinced, but I still think $16,000 is a bit high. I'm willing to go up to $14,000, but that's my final offer
